TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadDataCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadDataCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: Stellt die Methode zur Behandlung des -Ereignisses eines -Objekts dar.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Beim Erstellen eines -Delegaten bestimmen Sie die Methode für die Ereignisbehandlung.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Um dem Ereignishandler das Ereignis zuzuordnen, fügen Sie dem Ereignis eine Instanz des Delegaten hinzu.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Der Ereignishandler wird bei jedem Eintreten des Ereignisses aufgerufen, sofern der Delegat nicht entfernt wird.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Weitere Informationen zu Ereignishandlerdelegaten, finden Sie unter [NIB: Ereignisse und Delegaten](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples Im folgenden Codebeispiel wird veranschaulicht, asynchrone Hochladen von Daten.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading data. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#34)] Die folgende Methode wird aufgerufen, wenn der Upload abgeschlossen ist.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#35)]
